string-array.name: dvb_setting_instruct_dvbc
string-array.item: According to the nit table on the local main frequency to search
Search the standard frequency in order
Edit the attributes of channel,such as favorite,move...
View the program information of one week
Set the StopMode for Switch channel
Set the parameters of the DVBC

string-array.name: dvb_setting_instruct_dtmb
string-array.item: search all the program in DTMB
Edit the attributes of channel,such as favorite,move...
View the program information of one week
Set the parameters of the DTMB
